text: Rizky Dwi Febrianto (born February 22, 1997) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays for Liga 1 club Arema, Mainly a defensive midfielder, he can also operate as a full-back and central midfielder. ==Career== He made his professional debut in the Liga 1 on April 16, 2017 against Bali United. ==International career== He made his international debut for Indonesia U-23 on 7 June 2019 against Thailand U-23 and he scoring against Philippines U-23 on 9 June 2019 at 2019 Merlion Cup. ===International goals=== International under-23 goals {| class="wikitable" |- ! Goal !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! Competition |- | 1 || 9 June 2019 || Jalan Besar Stadium, Kallang, Singapore || || 2–0 || 5–0 || 2019 Merlion Cup |} ==References== ==External links== * Rizky Dwi Febrianto at Liga Indonesia * Rizky Dwi Febrianto at Soccerway Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Indonesia youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Persepam Pamekasan players Category:Madura United F.C. players Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Jember Regency
title: Rizky Dwi Febrianto
